name: Giant Firestorm
description: The Giant Firestorm is a huge, imposing figure with high Strength and Constitution, clad in hide armor. It wields an Obsidian Axe and can unleash devastating attacks infused with fire and cold damage.
memorable: Immunities to cold and fire damage, combined with the ability to create difficult terrain with Lava Geyser, make it a unique threat in battle.
goals: Engage in combat and control battlefield dynamics.
relations: May be encountered with other fire-based creatures or elemental beings.
environment: Typically found in volcanic areas or regions with extreme heat.
strengths: High damage output from melee and ranged attacks, along with the ability to manipulate terrain.
weaknesses: Low Charisma suggests poor social interactions or persuasion abilities.
attacks: Multiattack with the Obsidian Axe for slashing and elemental damage, and Firestorm Bolt for ranged fire and cold damage.
most_powerful_ability: Lava Geyser creates hazardous terrain and can severely damage foes with fire.
senses: It has a passive Perception of 16, allowing it to detect hidden threats effectively.
skills: Proficient in perception, enhancing its ability to notice enemies.
additional_information: Can deal both slashing and elemental damage.
High Strength (23) and Constitution (20) for durability.
Lava Geyser can affect multiple creatures.
spellcasting: Can perform Firestorm Bolt as a ranged spell attack.
